Description: Who We Are: At Huda Beauty, our Mission is to create a world of beauty where everyone is celebrated, so that we can inspire you to find your magic! Launched by award-winning beauty powerhouse Huda Kattan in 2013, Huda Beauty is one of the world’s fastest growing beauty and media brands. As a company, we are fuelled by purpose which allows us to approach things differently so that we can create products, content, and a community like no other. A lot has changed since our launch in 2013, but something that will forever remain at the core of Huda Beauty is our focus on Kaizen, breaking boundaries and our unwavering passion for kindness!Summary: Are you a highly organized and detail-oriented professional with a passion for optimizing supply chain operations? Are you ready to play a crucial role in the seamless flow of goods and materials within our organization? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you to join our global control tower team of highly motivated logistics professionals as a Logistics Coordinator.At Huda Beauty, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional products and services to our customers efficiently and on time. As a Logistics Coordinator, you will be at the forefront of our supply chain management efforts, ensuring that our end-to-end logistics operations run smoothly and efficiently. You will collaborate with various teams, forwarders, and suppliers to ensure the timely and cost-effective delivery of goods, all while maintaining the highest standards of quality and service level.Please note we will only be considering applicants that are available immediately!Job Details
